definitions.definition: A style of dress, including garments, accessories and hairstyle, especially as characteristic of a particular country, period or people.
definitions.example: The dancer was wearing Highland costume.

definitions.definition: An outfit or a disguise worn as fancy dress etc.
definitions.example: We wore gorilla costumes to the party.

definitions.definition: A set of clothes appropriate for a particular occasion or season.
definitions.example: The bride wore a grey going-away costume.

definitions.definition: To dress or adorn with a costume or appropriate garb.
